com.stormpath.sdk.query

Interface Options

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AccountCriteria, AccountOptions<T>, AccountStoreOptions<T>, ApiKeyCriteria, ApiKeyOptions<T>, ApplicationAccountStoreMappingCriteria, ApplicationAccountStoreMappingOptions<T>, ApplicationCriteria, ApplicationOptions<T>, AuthenticationOptions<T>, BasicAuthenticationOptions<T>, DirectoryCriteria, DirectoryOptions<T>, GroupCriteria, GroupOptions<T>, OrganizationAccountStoreMappingCriteria, OrganizationAccountStoreMappingOptions<T>, OrganizationCriteria, OrganizationOptions<T>, TenantCriteria, TenantOptions<T>

    public interface Options
    An Options instance represents one or more customizations to apply when retrieving Resources.
    Since:
    0.8
    See Also:
    AccountOptions, GroupOptions, ApplicationOptions, DirectoryOptions, TenantOptions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isEmpty()
      Returns true if this Options instance is empty (does not contain any options), false otherwise.

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Returns true if this Options instance is empty (does not contain any options), false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if this Options instance is empty (does not contain any options), false otherwise.
